meanings.definition: The quality of being open and honest in expression.
meanings.sent1: Her candours in sharing her feelings made everyone trust her.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your candours in telling me the truth.
meanings.sent3: His candours about his fear of spiders were both funny and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The candours of the painting revealed the artist's true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The candours of the child's laughter brightened the room.

meanings.sent5: His candours in admitting his mistake earned him respect.
